entry.title: New release for tillywork: v0.0.6
entry.content:
New Features

  • feat: customize table columns in your views by @MoShizzle in https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/pull/200
  • feat: track system email opens by @MoShizzle in https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/pull/197

General Changes

  • feat: remove hard coded fields and define card type fields by @MoShizzle in https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/pull/189
  • feat: updated registration and login styling by @MoShizzle in https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/pull/190
  • refactor: list groups by @MoShizzle in https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/pull/192
  • feat: show pinned fields in create card dialog by @MoShizzle in https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/pull/199

Bug Fixes

  • fix: settings page navigation on smaller screens by @MoShizzle in https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/pull/191
  • fix: use v-model instead of model-value in display chip by @MoShizzle in https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/pull/194
  • fix: deleting lists gives an error by @MoShizzle in https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/pull/195
  • fix: disable nx cache for npm run build by @MoShizzle in https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/pull/196
  • fix: consistent timestamps between client and server by @MoShizzle in https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/pull/198
  • fix: set description and due at field flags by @MoShizzle in https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/pull/201
  • fix: card comments data is not saved correctly by @MoShizzle in https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/pull/202

Full Changelog: https://github.com/tillywork/tillywork/compare/v0.0.5...v0.0.6
